title: Twisted Revenge: Episode 69
content:encoded:
A talented MMA fighter died of a drugs overdose in 2012.  His family were, as you can imagine, distraught.  But his dad knew exactly who he blamed for the death of his treasured son, and he planned to exact his revenge, with terrible results....

Enjoy the podcast and want more? Listen to 12 bonus episodes plus other exclusive content at www.patreon.com/uktruecrime
